about_the_game:
Type of game

Nightmare is a linear, pixelated, side-scrolling story-solving game that takes place in a modern urban setting, interacts with a dark world, numerous NPCs, and photo surveys to accompany you in every case.

A Brief Introduction to the Story

Fisher is an underdog private investigator.He lives in a crime-prone city, often without serious commissions, and scrapes by doing tedious work such as investigating infidelity and searching for lost pets.
One day, a high-spending client came to Fisher's door and entrusted him with investigating a burglary.
Rich clients, flawed criminals, easy evidence...As the investigation deepens, Fisher gradually detects a number of suspicious things in the seemingly simple commission, which leads to the discovery of an unknown murder.
A bizarre late-night dream takes Fischer into an incredible world.Here, he reincarnates the beast, returns and the reality is very different homicide scene, finally found the homicide truth the last piece of the puzzle.
Despite failing to find his client's stolen property, Fisher managed to pull off a perfect case.When he congratulates the dream for providing him with clues, he does not know that the dream world's conspiracy is also in the air, intent to devour what is left of his righteous soul...

Game Features

Game Actions
In a semi-open world, players will use to search the scene, analyze objects, and question NPCs to obtain evidence .


Correct the prisoner
Use the evidence you get to expose the lies the criminal tells and uncover the truth behind it!


The World Outside
In the inner world you will become a leopard, in the dark world to discover something unknown ~

short_description: "Legend Of Vengeancev"is a horizontal version of the pixel story puzzle game, the game through the complex and full of suspense story, let the player like reading a complex and full of suspense detective novel, as long as 8 hours of game flow and 3 game endings, you will be very addictive ~
